oshiSkill.name: ぎゅっきゅっ  ("Squeeze Squeeze")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn]Reduce the remaining HP of your opponent's Center holomem to 50.

spOshiSkill.name: 握りつぶしちゃうと  ("I'll Crush you")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] During this turn, give one of your holomems' Arts +50 power. If it's a White holomem, their Arts gain an additional +50 power.

oshiSkill.name: 文明の守護者  ("Guardian of Civilization")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Can be used during your opponent's turn when one of your holomems with #Promise receives damage: reduce that damage by 50.

spOshiSkill.name: アメイジング・ドローイング  ("Amazing Drawing")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Reveal 1 Event card from your Deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your Deck

oshiSkill.name: サバイバルパワ-~  ("Surival Power")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Reveal 1 <Stone Axe> from your deck and attach it to any of your green holomens. Then Shuffle your deck.

spOshiSkill.name: 大地の唄  ("Song of the Earth")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] if your Center holomen is green, restore all their HP

oshiSkill.name: 野兎たち~  ("Nousagis~")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Usable during your opponent's turn when one of your Holomen is knocked down: Reassign all green cheers from your one of your downed Holomen to your other Holomen.

spOshiSkill.name: 幸運兎  ("Lucky Rabbit")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] During this turn, treat all as if they had rolled 6

oshiSkill.name: 女幹部の采配 ("Executive's Order")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] When you archive a card from your hand using the ability of your red Holomen, you can activate this: For each card you would archive from your hand, you may instead archive one of your Holo Powers.

spOshiSkill.name: ホークアイ  ("Hawkeye")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] During your opponent's next turn, their Center Holomen and Collab Holomen cannot baton touch, move, or switch positions.

oshiSkill.name: フェニックステール ("Phoenix Tail")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Return 1 holomem from your Archive to your hand.

spOshiSkill.name: Rise from the ashes
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Can be used during your opponent's turn when any of your Red holomems is Downed: lose 1 less LIFE than you normally would. Then choose a holomem that was Downed and put that holomem, and all holomems stacked under it, into your hand.

oshiSkill.name: ほうき星  ("Comet")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] When this Oshimen or your blue Holomen deal damage to opp backline's Holomen, you may use this to deal 50 special damage to one of opp backline's holomen

spOshiSkill.name: シューティングスター  ("Shooting Star")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] When your blue holomen deal damage to opp's center holomen or collab holomen, you may use this to deal same amount of special damage to one of opp backline holomen

oshiSkill.name: レイン・シャーマニズム  ("Rain Shamen")
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Can only be used when you archive your cheer using one of your blue holomen ability : deal 20 dmg to any of your opp's holomens

spOshiSkill.name: 雨乞い ("Praying for rain")
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Send 1-5 cheers from your archive between your Holomens with #ID

name: 月と兎の物語 (Story of the Moon and the Rabbit)
ability: You can only use this card if your hand, excluding this card, has 6 or fewer cards. Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. From those, reveal any number of <Usada Pekora> and <Moona Hoshinova> cards, and add the revealed Holomen to your hand. Then, return the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Stone Axe
ability: The holomem with this Tool attached gains +20 power to their Arts. When the holomem with this Tool attached uses an Art, that holomem receives 10 special damage. If this is attached to a 1st Bloom or later <Aki Rosenthal>, it gains the following effect: (once per turn) when this holomem has their HP restored, draw 1 card from your Deck. Each Holomen can have only one tool attached.

name: 星街すいせいのマイク (Suisei's Mic)
ability: This tool provides the attached Holomen with +10 Arts.If attached to a <Hoshimachi Suisei> of 1st or higher, add the following ability: When the Holomen with this tool causes an opponent's Holomen to be knocked out, send 1 card from the top of your Cheer Deck to this Holomen. Each Holomen can have only one tool attached.

name: うぱお (Upao)

Each holomen can only have one mascot attached.

name: フレンド (Friend)

Each holomen can only have one mascot attached.

name: あん肝 (Ankimo)
ability: This mascot provides the attached Holomen with +10 HP. If attached to <Tokino Sora>, add the following ability: When the Holomen attached to this mascot uses an arts ability, this mascot is also treated as a cheer card. Each Holomen can have only one mascot attached.

name: ジョブズ (Jobz)
ability: This mascot provides the attached Holomen with +10 HP. If attached to <Aki Rosenthal>, add the following ability: When the Hololive member with this mascot uses an art, restore 10 HP to one of your Hololive members. Each Holomen can have only one mascot attached.

name: がんも (Ganmo)
ability: This mascot grants the Holomen it is attached to +10 Arts. If attached to <Takane Lui>: When the Holomen with this mascot uses an Arts in the Center Position, draw 1 card from your deck. Each Holomen can have only one mascot attached.

name: ロゼ隊 (Rose Corps)
ability: During the opponent's turn, when the Hololive member with this fan attached is knocked down, send the top card from your cheer deck to own <Aki Rosenthal>' This fan can only be attached to your <Aki Rosenthal> and any number of them can be attached to one Holomen.

name: 野うさぎ同盟 (Nousagi Alliance)
ability: When the Holomen with this fan attached rolls a die as part of an ability, you may archive this fan: Reroll the die once. This fan can only be attached to own <Usada Pekora> and any number of them can be attached to one Holomen.

name: 開拓者 (pioneer)
ability: During your opponent's turn, when the Holomen attached to this fan is knocked down, you may transfer 1 cheer card from the Holomen attached to this fan to another one of your Holomen. This fan can only be attached to own <AZKI> and any number of them can be attached to one Holomen.

name: 座員 (Zain)
